caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. Three people are in a room, and it appears that one man is subordinate to another man and a woman. They are discussing something with very serious expressions.Meanwhile, in the morning, by the seaside, a party is taking place with people cheering. Seated at the head is a man resembling a chieftain, and there are some people seated beside him. Two warriors below are engaged in combat, and one of them kills the other. Simultaneously, gifts keep getting presented to a woman, with the most notable gift being a large egg. The woman becomes upset over it. Then, that evening, the woman meets the chieftain-like man by the seaside.
